Indonesia's Prabowo has made no decision on energy subsidies, says aideIndonesia's Prabowo Subianto has made no decision on adjusting energy subsidies, a senior member of his team said on Friday, after media reported the likely new president would target subsidies as his first move upon assuming office in October. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:09:50 GMT 55PSYFX2IFIVJA634WUV2LZC44 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-prabowo-has-made-no-decision-energy-subsidies-says-aide-2024-02-16/Ananda Teresia世界亚太地区
Wars in Israel, Ukraine to dominate global security summit in MunichLeading politicians, military officers and diplomats from around the world gather in Munich on Friday for a security conference that will be dominated by the wars in Israel and Ukraine as well as fears over the U.S. commitment to defending its allies. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 06:06:03 GMT XX6LYO32P5P67FRPGS6MD6GOZE https://www.reuters.com/world/wars-israel-ukraine-dominate-global-security-summit-munich-2024-02-16/Sarah Marsh, Humeyra Pamuk世界
China to show off homegrown airliner at Singapore air show amid supply crunchSingapore will play host to Asia's biggest air show next week for the first time since the end of COVID border restrictions, with regional travel rebounding and the military side of the show bristling with defensive systems and nervous arms buyers. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:55:19 GMT UZIVEC3ZPFNH3I2MBP3O53UMJE https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/china-show-off-homegrown-airliner-singapore-air-show-amid-supply-crunch-2024-02-16/Lisa Barrington, Tim Hepher商业航空航天与国防
Egypt setting up area at Gaza border which could be used to shelter Palestinians, sources sayEgypt is preparing an area at the Gaza border which could accommodate Palestinians in case an Israeli offensive into Rafah prompts an exodus across the frontier, four sources said, in what they described as a contingency move by Cairo. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:47:33 GMT 2U5WH3EQUVKMNFAYZ2FATPVA3A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egypt-setting-up-area-gaza-border-which-could-be-used-shelter-palestinians-2024-02-16/Reuters世界中东
Two dead, scores injured after police open fire in India's Manipur stateAt least two people were killed and scores injured in India's northeastern Manipur state after security forces opened fire at a mob in Churachandpur district late on Thursday, a police official said, as sporadic violence continued in the region. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:36:12 GMT MXPZ4I32L5OORB2I4E47DSWH34 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/two-dead-scores-injured-after-police-open-fire-indias-manipur-state-2024-02-16/Tora Agarwala世界印度
Ukraine's Zelenskiy heads to Berlin, Paris to drum up wartime aidUkrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy was expected to visit Germany and France on Friday to try to drum up vital military assistance and sign bilateral security commitments as the war with Russia nears its third year. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:03:58 GMT UR2KDPEZ2RIUXNSGZNMVFIFOMY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-zelenskiy-heads-berlin-paris-drum-up-wartime-aid-2024-02-16/Yuliia Dysa世界欧洲
Britain's Labour Party deals double blow to PM Sunak's ConservativesBritain's Labour dealt a crushing blow to Prime Minister Rishi Sunak's Conservatives on Friday, winning contests for two new lawmakers in votes that suggested the opposition party was on track to win a national election later this year. Biden again tells Netanyahu that Rafah civilians must be protectedU.S. President Joe Biden on Thursday again told Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that he should not proced with military action in Rafah without a credible and executable plan to protect Palestinian civilians, the White House said. Cambodia 'upcycler' turns tonnes of plastic bottles into broomsIn a small warehouse in Cambodia's capital, a group of workers sit and spin waste plastic bottles into strips, turning them into bristles for brooms, of which they churn out 500 each day. Sydney parks cordoned off, Mardi Gras event cancelled after asbestos concernsAustralian authorities on Friday cordoned off areas in several parks in Sydney after the discovery of asbestos in mulch, while precautionary testing began in schools as the government scrambled to remove the toxic material from public spaces.
